verbs.description: [V: stem] [ARG1: vs the humanities] one the other a combination students discuss in the face of rapid advances in technology and a stronger emphasis on science and engineering interest in the humanities may be declining at u s colleges and universities as students become more focused on obtaining pragmatic career skills deborah fitzgerald president obama new york university yotam sagiv humanities ambassadors club cornell university mit school of humanities tsvi tannin new york universitys humanities ambassadors club ravi persaud
